text: ivarkal atamutaiya cantatiyilum, nuhvutan (kappalil) nam errik kontavarkali(n cantatiyi)lum, iprahimutaiyavum, israyil (yahkupin) cantatiyilum, innum nam terntetuttu nervaliyil natattiyavarkalilumulla napimarkalavarkal - ivarkal mitu allah arulaip polintan; arrahmanutaiya vacanankal avarkalin mitu otappattal, avarkal alutavarkalakavum, sujutu ceytavarkalakavum viluvarkal
